about_the_game:
——————————————————————

[No card drawing] [Don't force krypton] [You can go whoring for free]

Domestic independent games, Baokemeng MMOSRPG

——————————————————————

● In pursuit of my father

How can you help "you in this parallel world" to rally from the repeated failures in the recruitment trials of two cities?

● Take risks and cultivate

Your cultivation habits determine their growth direction. Please don't be too casual

● R&D, production and competition ○

Match, rank competition, Taoism hall team battle: form schools, compete with players or NPC for Taoism hall, and activate your brain cells

● Free trade and farming ○

Cultivate land for the elderly, trade with others, and spend a happy day

Game features:

[Original fighting mechanism, cultivation mechanism, synthesis production mechanism]

● Real time judgment round system ○

Better experience of forming a team to open a black game: open a black competition, team copy - dangerous adventure, without full assurance, please call your partner, please do not go alone

● Effectively attack scripts and plug-ins ○

The three innovative customization systems effectively crack down on scripts and plug-ins, and protect the security of commercial activities such as buying, selling, leasing, entrustment, agency, inheritance, etc

● Interaction between NPC and Yuanling ○

Yuanling and NPC, they have their own ideas. Don't bully them easily
detailed_description:
——————————————————————

[No card drawing] [Don't force krypton] [You can go whoring for free]

Domestic independent games, Baokemeng MMOSRPG

——————————————————————

● In pursuit of my father

How can you help "you in this parallel world" to rally from the repeated failures in the recruitment trials of two cities?

● Take risks and cultivate

Your cultivation habits determine their growth direction. Please don't be too casual

● R&D, production and competition ○

Match, rank competition, Taoism hall team battle: form schools, compete with players or NPC for Taoism hall, and activate your brain cells

● Free trade and farming ○

Cultivate land for the elderly, trade with others, and spend a happy day

Game features:

[Original fighting mechanism, cultivation mechanism, synthesis production mechanism]

● Real time judgment round system ○

Better experience of forming a team to open a black game: open a black competition, team copy - dangerous adventure, without full assurance, please call your partner, please do not go alone

● Effectively attack scripts and plug-ins ○

The three innovative customization systems effectively crack down on scripts and plug-ins, and protect the security of commercial activities such as buying, selling, leasing, entrustment, agency, inheritance, etc

● Interaction between NPC and Yuanling ○

Yuanling and NPC, they have their own ideas. Don't bully them easily
ext_user_account_notice: 已有账号与steam账号绑定服务：可以将其他平台注册的账号与steam账号进行绑定链接，绑定后，通过steam打开游戏并进入游戏，将直接无感登录 (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
